name: CryptosporidiumSpeciesTestsByMicroscopicObservation
title: Cryptosporidium species (Tests by Microscopic Observation)
purpose:
(Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for laboratory test names specific for detecting Cryptosporidium by microscopy),(Data Element Scope: Laboratory tests names that were ordered or performed.),(Inclusion Criteria: VSAC query: Cryptosporidium stain;  

LOINC search: “cryptosporidium stain -coccidia”),(Exclusion Criteria: Any LOINCs that are not appropriate for microscopic observations)
